full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 152 of 261 1313 LC6Cmax5 McHugh - direct
1 Q. Thank you. All right. So, if we could turn to now page 8 of Government Exhibit 504, I'm going to ask you about some transactions from this account statement.
2 Ms. Drescher if you could please highlight the bottom two transactions on page 8 that are both dated September 18, 2002.
3 So, focusing on this first transaction on September 18th, marked sale, could you please walk the jury through what we're looking at in this transaction.
4 A. On September 18th, there was a sale of five million shares of the JP Morgan tax free money market fund institutional share class that raised $5 million in cash.
5 Q. In layman's terms, what does that mean?
6 A. It means that $5 million is now available in the account.
7 Q. Turning to the entry right below that on September 18th, marked disbursement, could you please walk the jury through what that notation means.
8 A. I'm sorry. Could you repeat that.
9 Q. Of course. So focusing on the second entry here dated September 18th, could you please walk the jury through this particular transaction.
10 A. On September 18th, there was a transfer by wire to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co. for the account of Ghislaine Maxwell for $5 million.
11 Q. What does the abbreviation FAO stand for?
12 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
13 DOJ-OGR-00018489
